title: About me:
content:
My name is Hassan Nauman and I am a 2nd year Computer Science student at The University of Manitoba. I came to Winnipeg in May 2018 in ICM. I am originally from Lahore, Pakistan but am born and raised in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. I am currently in Riyadh as my university is closed and all the classes are online. 

Let me know about yourself by clicking on the “+” button. Make sure to add a picture of yourself so I can get to know you better .

title: How I learned to design websites
content: This summer I took a software development course in which they taught me how to design websites using HTML, CSS and JS. I also learned how to use API’s like REST API using NodeJS. I am also currently learning ReactJS. I aim to work on projects as a freelancer after I have mastered web development/app development.

title: What I’m working on right now?
content: I am currently building a mobile-friendly website for the Pakistani Students’ Association(UofM). I myself am a member so I recently came up with the idea to build a website on which we can introduce our team, market our events and help new students by sharing all the necessary information needed.
